price: „А ја сам управо изасланик твога Господара“, рече он, „да ти поклоним честитог дечака!“
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
